name: Travelzoo Inc.
description: Travelzoo Inc. is a global Internet media company that publishes travel, entertainment, and local deals. Founded in 1998, Travelzoo has a mission to inspire travelers with exceptional deals and experiences. The company operates a trusted online platform that connects consumers with the best offers on travel, leisure activities, and accommodations. Travelzoo’s website and email newsletters reach millions of subscribers, featuring curated deals from various travel and entertainment providers. The company’s unique business model focuses on providing exclusive offers and discounts that are verified by their in-house deal experts, ensuring that customers receive high-quality options. In addition to its core offerings, Travelzoo has expanded its portfolio to include travel guides, booking services, and user-generated reviews, enhancing the overall travel planning experience. With a commitment to customer satisfaction and a strong online presence, Travelzoo aims to be the go-to source for travelers seeking memorable experiences at unbeatable prices.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA

seo.meta_title: Travelzoo Inc. | Travel and Entertainment Deals
seo.meta_description: Discover Travelzoo Inc., a leader in travel and entertainment deals. Explore exclusive offers, travel guides, and customer reviews to plan your next adventure.

faq.question: What does Travelzoo offer?
faq.answer: Travelzoo offers exclusive travel, entertainment, and local deals, including hotels, vacation packages, and dining options.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Travelzoo?
faq.answer: Holger Bartel is the CEO of Travelzoo Inc.

faq.question: Where is Travelzoo headquartered?
faq.answer: Travelzoo is headquartered in New York City, New York, USA.

faq.question: How can I access Travelzoo deals?
faq.answer: You can access Travelzoo deals through their website and email newsletters.
